exploit.name: MS08-067
exploit.description: Description: Remote code execution in Microsoft Windows Server 2008.
exploit.result: Result: Exploit successful: Command shell opened.

exploit.name: Shellshock
exploit.description: Description: Remote code execution in Bash.
exploit.result: Result: Exploit successful: Remote access obtained.

exploit.name: MS17-010
exploit.description: Description: Remote code execution vulnerability in Microsoft Windows SMBv1.
exploit.result: Result: Exploit successful: Meterpreter session opened.

exploit.name: Heartbleed
exploit.description: Description: Information disclosure vulnerability in OpenSSL.
exploit.result: Result: Exploit successful: Sensitive information leaked.

exploit.name: Poodle
exploit.description: Description: Man-in-the-middle attack vulnerability in SSL 3.0.
exploit.result: Result: Exploit failed: Target not vulnerable.

exploit.description: Description: Remote code execution vulnerability in Apache Struts 2.

exploit.name: BlueKeep

exploit.description: Description: Information disclosure vulnerability in CPUs.
